comments:
Hi,
[Eclipse 3.1 M7, OSX 10.4.1]

I undid a change to a text editor with Command-Z and got this error:

An internal error occurred during: "Reading saved version of file for quick diff".

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.jface.text.AbstractDocument.fireDocumentAboutToBeChanged(AbstractDocument.java:
613)
at org.eclipse.jface.text.AbstractDocument.set(AbstractDocument.java:1078)
at org.eclipse.jface.text.AbstractDocument.set(AbstractDocument.java:1068)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.quickdiff.LastSaveReferenceProvider.setDocumentContent
(LastSaveReferenceProvider.java:386)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.quickdiff.LastSaveReferenceProvider.readDocument
(LastSaveReferenceProvider.java:247)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.quickdiff.LastSaveReferenceProvider.access$0
(LastSaveReferenceProvider.java:198)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.quickdiff.LastSaveReferenceProvider$ReadJob.run
(LastSaveReferenceProvider.java:108)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:67)
Could not reproduce using N20050522-0010. Can you reproduce?
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 90590 ***
